title: Winchester Model 1906 Pump-Action Rifle (.22 Caliber)
item_description:
Winchester Model 1906 Pump-Action Rifle (.22 Caliber)

  • Manufacturer: Winchester Repeating Arms Co.
  • Model: 1906
  • Serial Number: 142415
    • “B”, marked on barrel indicates it's a Model 1906 “Expert” or Second Variant.
  • Caliber (as marked on barrel): .22 Short, .22 Long 
  • Patent Dates:
    • Jan. 29, 1901
    • Other referenced patents: June 26, 1888, Dec. 6, 1892, Nov. 27, 1906
  • Chamber Markings: "22 SHORT LONG OR LONG RIFLE"
  • Top Tang Markings: "WINCHESTER - TRADE MARK - REG. IN U.S. PAT. OFF."
  • Manufactured in: New Haven, Connecticut, U.S.A.
  • Action: Slide-action (pump-action)
